attributes.action: Every community to have its OWN Police officer
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Under the last Tory government my community had its own Police officer, who knew everyone in the immediate area therefore knew instantly if anyone in his or her area started misbehaving. I believe that if each community had a Police officer responsible for a certain geographical area Policing would improve and thusly crime will go down. The government tells us there are more Police officers than ever, if this is so let’s see them.....
